message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I'm looking for $180 for it.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me in the middle?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I can meet you halfway between $120 and $180, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $150
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $130. Can you consider that?
I can see you're still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $130. I can meet you halfway between $130 and $150, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $140
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to go up to $135. Can you consider that?
I can see you're really interested in the product, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $135. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $135 and $150, so I'm willing to sell it to you for $142.50
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm still a bit short. I'm willing to go up to $130. Can you consider that?
